Articles.Content:
HI

if you bubble+ right click on the command pod you can get a crew report and store it after how do you close the tabs ?

thanks beau

Edited July 22, 2014 by n9mfk

For "tabs" you mean the menu you opened by right-clicking on the command pod? Just right-click on any empty place.

The Crew Report closes as you select one of the options in it.
